job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and potentially integrating new functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions, which is a core task in model development and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, even if AI-related, is a software development task focused on integration and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system to enhance its functionality, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to multiple products within a short timeframe.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a pragmatic approach to overcoming challenges without constant supervision.

profile.rationale: The role focuses on analyzing, improving, and integrating AI systems into customer support resolutions. While it involves AI model fine-tuning and feedback (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on integrating these AI capabilities into existing systems and improving the overall support process (1.A.1). There's no indication of building AI models from scratch or deep specialization in AI research. The role is about using AI as a tool to enhance a software-driven support function, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The distinction between core AI development and applying AI to enhance existing systems is evident. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as some phrases could be interpreted with slightly more depth in AI model development, though the overall context leans towards integration.
